1.title: Trizz

episode of.title: Inner Views: Life Behind Bars (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Inland Empire (CA) artist Trizz sits down with us to discuss the value(s) of being independent, his ties to powerhouse indie label Strange Music, his relationship with musical mentor Brotha Lynch Hung and much more.

2.title: Tru Heru

episode of.title: Inner Views: Life Behind Bars (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: We sit down with Long Beach and newly signed OGG (Originality Gains Greatness) artist Tru Heru. A mysterious mind, he opens up to discuss his project "The Art Of Dying", the importance of family, spirituality, Bruce Lee and much more.

3.title: Locksmith

episode of.title: Inner Views: Life Behind Bars (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: We took a trip up the coast to the Bay Area to touch base with refined Richmond rhymer Locksmith. Having furthered his career to new lengths these past years with an array of potent & individually prolific poetic pieces with The Green Box, A Thousand Cuts, and his most recent project, Lofty Goals, he continues to excel to new heights after nearly fifteen years in the game. We sit down and discuss what it was like growing up in "The Rich" as a biracial child, attending UC Berkeley, battle rapping vs. making records and much more.

4.title: Chuuwee

episode of.title: Inner Views: Life Behind Bars (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Our May/June episode of our web series takes us to the California capitol of Sacramento where we link with young yet veteran Chuuwee. We sit down and discuss his already storied career, his experience(s) touring Europe, Buddhism, his family and much more.

imdb.title: Inner Views: Life Behind Bars
akas: Inner Views: Life Behind Bars (United States)
plot: Docuseries focused on west coast's artists in a cinematic/in-depth manner; centered on presenting/promoting hip-hop culture on a thorough visual platform.::Inner Views
